title: Update Admin Panel Login UI to Match New Design

requirements.summary: Update LoginPage component to match the uploaded design mockup with centered card layout, logo, heading, subtitle, three feature sections with icons, and disclaimer text
acceptanceCriteria: The LoginPage displays the Salad Khatora logo centered at the top
The heading 'Admin Panel Login' is displayed below the logo
The subtitle 'Secure authentication for administrative access' appears below the heading
Three feature sections are displayed with shield, lock, and fingerprint icons
Each feature section shows the title and description as shown in the mockup
The disclaimer text 'By logging in, you agree to use this admin panel responsibly' appears at the bottom
The Internet Identity login functionality remains functional
The layout is responsive and works on mobile devices

file_operations.description: Replace the existing layout with a centered card design. Add the Salad Khatora logo at the top (use the existing logo reference from frontend/public/Salad Khatora.jpeg). Update the heading to 'Admin Panel Login' and add the subtitle 'Secure authentication for administrative access'. Replace the current feature list with three feature sections displaying icons (Shield icon for 'Secure Authentication', Lock icon for 'No Passwords', Fingerprint icon for 'Biometric Support') and their respective descriptions from the design mockup. Add the disclaimer text 'By logging in, you agree to use this admin panel responsibly' at the bottom of the card. Maintain the existing Internet Identity authentication flow using the useInternetIdentity hook and the login button functionality. Ensure the layout is centered on the page and responsive for mobile devices. Preserve the existing navigation redirect to the dashboard on successful authentication.

requirements.summary: Maintain existing Internet Identity authentication integration and ensure successful login redirects to admin dashboard
acceptanceCriteria: The Internet Identity login flow is triggered when the user attempts to log in
Successful authentication redirects users to the admin dashboard
The authentication state is properly managed using the existing useInternetIdentity hook
No authentication functionality is broken by the UI changes

file_operations.description: Verify that the useInternetIdentity hook integration remains intact during the UI restructuring. Ensure the login button or clickable area triggers the login() function from useInternetIdentity. Maintain the existing redirect logic that navigates authenticated users to '/dashboard'. Preserve the authentication state checks and loading states (loginStatus === 'logging-in'). Test that the error handling for login failures remains functional. Do not modify the authentication logic itself, only ensure it continues to work correctly with the new UI structure.
